## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." It features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. ## K MINI Kärchers kleinster Hochdruckreiniger beseitigt Verschmutzungen im Handumdrehen und ist durch sein geringes Gewicht und die handliche Größe problemlos zu transportieren und zu verstauen. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.600-054.0 ## Text Content - Kompakter und leichter Hochdruckreiniger für eine flexible Reinigung - Komfortable Zubehör- und Kabelaufbewahrung für maximale Ordnung - Extra dünner und flexibler PremiumFlex-Hochdruckschlauch gegen lästige Verknüpfungen und für maximale Bewegungsfreiheit während der Reinigung ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278804712
Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 110 / 2 - max. 11
Fördermenge l/h max. 360
Flächenleistung m²/h 20
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung W 1400
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 3,9
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 5,8
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 278 × 233 × 296
## Ausstattung
Strahlrohrverlängerung [ ]
Hochdruckpistole G 110 Q Short
Vario Power Jet [ ]
HD-Schlauch m S / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [ ]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [ ]
Kabelaufwicklung [ ]
## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and sides. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The overall color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Description The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. To the right of the number, there is a bright yellow arrow shape containing the text: - **WORLD'S NO. 1** - **PREGLUED GLAZING BRAND** The text is in uppercase, with "WORLD'S NO. 1" at the top and "PREGLUED GLAZING BRAND" below it. The font is bold and black, ensuring high contrast against the yellow background for clear visibility. The overall design suggests a focus on being a leading or top-ranked brand in the specified category. ## Description The image is a logo for the "Red Dot Design Award," specifically indicating a winner from the year 2023. The logo features a stylized red dot, which is a spherical shape with a pattern of curved lines, resembling a globe or a ball. Below the logo, the text reads "red dot winner 2023" in lowercase letters. The text is in a simple, modern font, with "red dot" in red and "winner 2023" in black. This logo signifies that the associated product or design has been recognized for excellence in design by the Red Dot organization in 2023. ## Detailed Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized representation of a pressure washer nozzle. The nozzle is depicted with a plus sign (+) and a minus sign (−) above it, indicating adjustable power settings. The nozzle is shown spraying a stream onto a surface, represented by a horizontal line. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, creating a high-contrast visual. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power or intensity of the spray. ## Description The image shows a compact pressure washer with a modern design. It consists of three main components: 1. **Main Unit**: - The main body is predominantly black with a bright yellow accent around the front panel. - The front panel features a circular vent or speaker-like design. - The brand name is visible on the top of the front panel. - There is a hose connection point on the lower left side of the unit. 2. **Hose**: - A coiled, gray hose is included, designed to connect to the main unit. 3. **Spray Gun**: - The spray gun is black with yellow accents, matching the main unit. - It has a long nozzle for directing the water spray. This pressure washer is likely designed for home use, suitable for cleaning tasks such as washing cars, patios, or outdoor furniture. The compact design suggests it is portable and easy to store.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." It features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

## K MINI

Kärchers kleinster Hochdruckreiniger beseitigt Verschmutzungen im Handumdrehen und ist durch sein geringes Gewicht und die handliche Größe problemlos zu transportieren und zu verstauen.

## Text Content

- Kompakter und leichter Hochdruckreiniger für eine flexible Reinigung
- Komfortable Zubehör- und Kabelaufbewahrung für maximale Ordnung
- Extra dünner und flexibler PremiumFlex-Hochdruckschlauch gegen lästige Verknüpfungen und für maximale Bewegungsfreiheit während der Reinigung

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278804712
Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 110 / 2 - max. 11
Fördermenge l/h max. 360
Flächenleistung m²/h 20
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung W 1400
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 3,9
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 5,8
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 278 × 233 × 296

## Ausstattung
Strahlrohrverlängerung [ ]
Hochdruckpistole G 110 Q Short
Vario Power Jet [ ]
HD-Schlauch m S / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [ ]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [ ]
Kabelaufwicklung [ ]

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and sides. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The overall color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. To the right of the number, there is a bright yellow arrow shape containing the text:

- **WORLD'S NO. 1**
- **PREGLUED GLAZING BRAND**

The text is in uppercase, with "WORLD'S NO. 1" at the top and "PREGLUED GLAZING BRAND" below it. The font is bold and black, ensuring high contrast against the yellow background for clear visibility. The overall design suggests a focus on being a leading or top-ranked brand in the specified category.

## Description

The image is a logo for the "Red Dot Design Award," specifically indicating a winner from the year 2023. The logo features a stylized red dot, which is a spherical shape with a pattern of curved lines, resembling a globe or a ball. Below the logo, the text reads "red dot winner 2023" in lowercase letters. The text is in a simple, modern font, with "red dot" in red and "winner 2023" in black. This logo signifies that the associated product or design has been recognized for excellence in design by the Red Dot organization in 2023.

## Detailed Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized representation of a pressure washer nozzle. The nozzle is depicted with a plus sign (+) and a minus sign (−) above it, indicating adjustable power settings. The nozzle is shown spraying a stream onto a surface, represented by a horizontal line. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, creating a high-contrast visual. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power or intensity of the spray.

## Description

The image shows a compact pressure washer with a modern design. It consists of three main components:

1. **Main Unit**: 
   - The main body is predominantly black with a bright yellow accent around the front panel.
   - The front panel features a circular vent or speaker-like design.
   - The brand name is visible on the top of the front panel.
   - There is a hose connection point on the lower left side of the unit.

2. **Hose**:
   - A coiled, gray hose is included, designed to connect to the main unit.

3. **Spray Gun**:
   - The spray gun is black with yellow accents, matching the main unit.
   - It has a long nozzle for directing the water spray.

This pressure washer is likely designed for home use, suitable for cleaning tasks such as washing cars, patios, or outdoor furniture. The compact design suggests it is portable and easy to store.
